statements: DELETE FROM discounts_and_promotions WHERE customer_segment = 'VIP' AND start_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM discounts_and_promotions WHERE customer_segment = 'VIP' AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM discounts_and_promotions WHERE product_id = 101 AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 100 AND price > 50;
DELETE FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id IN (SELECT segment_id FROM customer_segments WHERE discount_rate < 10);
DELETE FROM products WHERE id = 1 AND name = 'Product1';
DELETE FROM promotions WHERE type = 'Seasonal' AND discount >= 10.00;
DELETE FROM product_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 2, 3);
